mapper.select: SELECT M.EMP_NO, M.STORE_ID, S.STORE_NAME, S.STORE_ADDRESS, M.MEM_ID, M.MEM_PWD, M.MEM_NAME, M.PHONE, M.POSITION, M.STATUS, M.CREATE_DATE, M.MODIFY_DATE, M.HIRE_DATE, M.SALARY, CEIL(SYSDATE - M.CREATE_DATE) AS WORKDATE FROM MEMBER M LEFT JOIN STORE S ON M.STORE_ID = S.STORE_ID WHERE M.MEM_ID = #{memId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER ( EMP_NO, MEM_ID, MEM_PWD, MEM_NAME, PHONE ) VALUES ( EMP_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{memId}, #{memPwd}, #{memName}, #{phone} )
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT M.EMP_NO, M.CREATE_DATE, M.MEM_NAME, S.STORE_NAME, M.POSITION, M.PHONE, M.SALARY FROM MEMBER M JOIN STORE S ON M.STORE_ID = S.STORE_ID WHERE M.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY M.EMP_NO ASC
SELECT DISTINCT STORE_NAME FROM STORE ORDER BY STORE_NAME ASC

SELECT M.EMP_NO, M.HIRE_DATE, M.MEM_NAME, S.STORE_NAME, M.POSITION, M.PHONE, M.SALARY FROM MEMBER M JOIN STORE S ON M.STORE_ID = S.STORE_ID WHERE M.STATUS = 'Y' AND S.STORE_NAME = #{store} ORDER BY M.EMP_NO ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE STATUS = 'N'
SELECT EMP_NO, STORE_ID, MEM_ID, MEM_PWD, MEM_NAME, PHONE, POSITION, STATUS, CREATE_DATE, MODIFY_DATE, HIRE_DATE, SALARY FROM MEMBER WHERE STATUS = 'N' ORDER BY EMP_NO ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER M SET M.STATUS = 'Y', M.POSITION = 'employee', M.STORE_ID = (SELECT S.STORE_ID FROM STORE S WHERE S.STORE_NAME = #{storeSelect}) WHERE M.MEM_ID =#{memId}
mapper.select: SELECT M.EMP_NO, M.CREATE_DATE, M.MEM_ID, M.MEM_NAME, M.PHONE, S.STORE_NAME, M.STORE_ID FROM MEMBER M JOIN STORE S ON M.STORE_ID = S.STORE_ID WHERE M.STATUS = 'Y' AND S.STATUS = 'N' AND M.POSITION = 'employee' AND M.STORE_ID = S.STORE_ID ORDER BY M.EMP_NO ASC
SELECT DISTINCT M.EMP_NO, M.CREATE_DATE, M.MEM_NAME, S.STORE_NAME, M.POSITION, M.PHONE, M.SALARY FROM MEMBER M JOIN STORE S ON M.STORE_ID = S.STORE_ID WHERE M.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY M.EMP_NO ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND STORE_ID IS NOT NULL
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER M JOIN STORE S ON M.STORE_ID = S.STORE_ID WHERE S.STORE_NAME = #{storeName}

SELECT M.EMP_NO, M.STORE_ID, M.MEM_ID, M.MEM_PWD, M.MEM_NAME, M.PHONE, M.POSITION, M.STATUS, M.CREATE_DATE, M.MODIFY_DATE, M.HIRE_DATE, M.SALARY, S.STORE_NAME FROM MEMBER M JOIN STORE S ON M.STORE_ID = S.STORE_ID WHERE S.STORE_NAME = #{storeName} ORDER BY M.EMP_NO DESC
